v.v: Hear this, house of Jacob,
For they call themselves people of the holy city
“I have declared the things from long ago; they came out from my mouth, and I made them known;
Because I knew that you were obstinate,
therefore I declared these things to you beforehand; before they happened I informed you,
You heard about these things; look at all this evidence; and you, will you not admit what I said is true? From now on, I am showing you new things, hidden things that you have not known.
Now, and not from previously, they come into being, and before today you have not heard about them,
You never heard; you did not know; these things were not unfolded to your ears beforehand.
For the sake of my name I will defer my anger, and for my honor I will hold back from destroying you.
Look, I refined you, but not as silver; I have purified you in the furnace of affliction.
For my own sake, for my own sake I will act; for how can I allow my name to be profaned?
Listen to me, Jacob, and Israel, whom I called:
Yes, my hand laid the foundation of the earth, and my right hand spread out the heavens;
Assemble yourselves, all of you, and listen! Who among you has announced these things?
I, I have spoken, yes, I have summoned him, I have brought him, and he will succeed.
Come near to me, listen to this:
This is what Yahweh, your Redeemer, the Holy One of Israel says,
If only you had obeyed my commandments!
Your descendants would have been as numerous as the sand, and the children from your womb as numerous as the grains of sand;
Come out from Babylon! Flee from the Chaldeans!
They did not thirst when he led them through the deserts;
There is no peace for the wicked—says Yahweh.”

v: who are called by the name Israel, and have come from the sperm of Judah;
you who swear by the name of Yahweh and invoke the God of Israel,
but not sincerely nor in a righteous manner.
and trust in the God of Israel. Yahweh of hosts is his name.
then suddenly I did them, and they came to pass.
your neck muscles tight as iron, and your forehead like bronze,
so you could not say, ‘My idol has done them,’ or ‘My carved figure and my cast metal figure has ordained these things.’
so you will not be able to say, ‘Yes, I knew about them.’
For I knew that you have been very deceitful, and that you have been a rebel from birth.
I will not give my glory to anyone else.
I am he; I am the first, I also am the last.
when I call to them, they stand up together.
Yahweh’s ally will accomplish his purpose against Babylon. He will carry out Yahweh’s will against the Chaldeans.
From the beginning I have not spoken in secret; when it happens, I am there.”
Now the Lord Yahweh has sent me, and his Spirit.
“I am Yahweh your God, who teaches you how to succeed,
who leads you by the way that you should go.
Then your peace and prosperity would have flowed like a river, and your salvation like the waves of the sea.
their name would not have been cut off nor blotted out from before me.
With the sound of a ringing cry announce it! Make this known, make it go out to the ends of the earth!
Say, ‘Yahweh has redeemed his servant Jacob.’
he made the water to flow out of the rock for them;
he split open the rock, and the waters gushed out.
